LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_RendingClaws.label: rending claws
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_RendingClaws.description: Mutated claws used by the Infested to tear through steel, flesh and bone. Once removed from the Infested, they may be repurposed.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_RendingClaws.tools.0.label: edge
LanguageData.Bullet_ProwlerSpit.label: prowler spit
LanguageData.Gun_ProwlerSpit.label: prowler paralysis organ
LanguageData.Gun_ProwlerSpit.description: A mutated saliva producing organ that spews globules of paralytic venom.
